revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Conceptronic |model=C300BRS4 |revision=v1 |upc=8714909009454 |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/21/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=RRK-C300BRS4 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT1310A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 MiB |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032M90TFIR4 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620ETP-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860;RT2860T, GS37540D0, 0652ST; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820;RT2820L, CU62980B0, 0652ST; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306S |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=C300BRS4 |default_ssid_regex=^C300BRS4$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:80:5A |oui_eth=00:80:5A }} Default settings (and the 00:80:5A OUI) are per the FCC manual.
